DOC.detailed_description: Intrathecal ( i.t . ) administration isobaric bupivacaine , ropivacaine levobupivacaine without addition fentanyl c-section exist date . Parturients schedule elective caesarean section allocate receive double-blindly i.t . isobaric bupivacaine 10 mg , ropivacaine 15mg , levobupivacaine 10mg local anaesthetic 10 Î¼g fentanyl respectively . Sensory block ( pin prick test ) motor block ( Bromage scale ) profile , intraoperative postoperative analgesia , haemodynamics side effect assess .
DOC.criteria: Parturients schedule elective c section Stillborn Normal cardiotocogram BMI > 35kg/m2 Height < 150cm > 185cm Age ( < 18 , > 40 ) ASA > II Multiple gestation Pregnancy complication ( eclampsia , GDP , placenta previa , > 2 previous c section ) Contraindication spinal anaesthesia Failure educate patient , language barrier Patient prefer GA
